pullrequest.title: Support to use an external libccd

content.raw:
This section only needs to be:

pkg_check_modules(CCD ccd >= 1.4)

if (NOT CCD_FOUND)

  set(CCD_INCLUDE_DIRS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/deps/libccd/include")

  set(CCD_LIBRARIES gazebo_ccd) 

endif (NOT CCD_FOUND)


pkg-config sets CCD_INCLUDE_DIRS and CCD_LIBRARIES for you, you don't need to do include_directories or link_directories.  You also don't really need INTERNAL_LIBCCD, since it's always just NOT CCD_FOUND.  The above is what I use in the Fedora package (that change is mixed into http://rmattes.fedorapeople.org/RPMS/gazebo/gazebo-2.2.2-fedora.patch)
